Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you, which I believe is worth every penny of its $10000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
